name: Astro-Bastard Drunken Rampage
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/astro-bastard-drunken-rampage

On his way home from the big intergalactic sportsball stadium, Astro-Bastard crash lands on a Type 0 planet.

He must scavenge for the loose parts of his ship that are now scattered amongst the towns and cities of this formerly peaceful, and to him small, world.

CONTROLS:

MOVE : wasd/arrow keys/left joystick

JUMP : space/A button

STOMP : left shift/B button

QUIT : escape/start
